brochureSubtitle: Discover the premier destination for comfortable accommodations, versatile event spaces, and exceptional catering services at {siteName}.
brochureAboutUsContent: At {siteName}, we are dedicated to providing top-tier services for individuals and organizations. Whether you need a place to stay, a venue for your next event, or professional catering, we have you covered with excellence and attention to detail.
brochureDormitoriesDesc: Secure, clean, and well-maintained dormitory rooms perfect for short-term or long-term stays, offering a conducive environment for study and rest.
brochureHallsDesc: Spacious and adaptable halls and sections suitable for conferences, workshops, meetings, and various events, equipped with modern amenities.
brochureCateringDesc: Delicious and diverse catering options for your events, from coffee breaks to full lunch services, tailored to meet your specific needs.
brochureKeyFeaturesMore: And much more to make your experience seamless and productive!
brochureWhyChooseExcellentService: Dedicated staff providing excellent customer service.
brochureWhyChooseCommitmentToQuality: Commitment to quality and guest satisfaction.
brochureCallToActionTitle: Get In Touch or Book Today!
brochureCallToActionDesc: We are eager to assist you. Contact us for more information or to make a booking for our dormitories, halls, or catering services.
qrCodeAltText: QR Code linking to our brochure
discoverMoreSubtitle: Scan the QR code with your phone to view our digital brochure and learn more about what we offer.
scanForBrochureDesc: Access service details, gallery, and more on the go.
faqSubtitle: Find answers to common questions about our services.
faqQ1Title: How do I book a dormitory room?
faqQ1Answer: You can book a dormitory room directly through our website. Navigate to the 'Dormitories' page, select your preferred room and dates, and fill out the booking form. Payment details will be provided, and confirmation is sent after payment verification via Telegram.
faqQ2Title: What types of halls and sections are available for events?
faqQ2Answer: We offer a variety of halls and smaller sections suitable for conferences, workshops, meetings, and seminars. Capacities vary, so please check the 'Halls & Sections' page for details on each space.
faqQ3Title: How can I book a hall or section for an event?
faqQ3Answer: Companies can register on our website. Once your company account is approved, you can log in to book halls/sections, select dates, specify attendee numbers, and choose catering services. An agreement will be generated for formalization.
faqQ4Answer: For dormitory bookings, payment is typically made via bank transfer to the account details provided on the booking confirmation page. For facility bookings by companies, payment terms will be outlined in the rental agreement.
faqQ5Title: Are catering services available for all bookings?
faqQ5Answer: Catering services (lunch and refreshments) are primarily offered for hall and section bookings. You can select your preferred catering level during the facility booking process.
faqQ6Title: What is the process for company registration?
faqQ6Answer: Click on the 'Register Company' link, fill in your company details, and submit the form. Your registration will be reviewed by our admin team, and you'll be notified upon approval.
faqQ7Title: Who can I contact for support or more information?
faqQ7Answer: Please visit our 'Contact Us' page for detailed contact information for building supervisors (for dormitory issues) and general inquiries. You can also use the live chat widget on our website during office hours.
